```{r}

enrollment_data <- read_csv('/Users/katherinemead/Documents/GitHub/anly-501-project-kam515/data/00-raw-data/2009-20_School_Enrollment_Data_12.csv')
```

```{r}

library(ggplot2)

# Create a table with change in 

race_freq_df <- select(enrollment_data, race, enrollment, year)

# drop total from dataframe
race_freq_df <- filter(race_freq_df, race!="Total")

print(unique(race_freq_df$race))

head(race_freq_df)




# create line graph with year on X axis and enrollment on y axis w/ different colors for different races

ggplot(race_freq_df, aes(x=date)) + 
  geom_line(aes(y = psavert), color = "darkred") + 
  geom_line(aes(y = uempmed), color="steelblue", linetype="twodash") 

```
